name: Adventurer: Exodus
description:
Adventurer: Exodus is the demo version of a text-based RPG in development.

Alone on your journey through the ancient forests and misty mountains of northwest Ivalice, you must carefully prepare before you set out, for each random encounter is designed to test you.  Though you may learn fantastic new spells and find legendary weapons to wield, you cannot escape your mortality.  Find safe places to make camp and rest, lest the long road get the better of you.  Harvest magic crystals from slain enemies to fuel your elemental magic, whichever disciplines you practice.  Mind the weather and time of day, for fire spells are stifled by rain, and arrows may not find their targets under the darkness of night.  Study your foes to learn their weaknesses, and bring the right weapons and abilities to the battle.

Can you defeat the cosmic invader deep in the fortress of the dead?

Inspired by games like Final Fantasy XII, Dragon Quest VIII, and Breath of the Wild, Adventurer is a new take on the JRPG genre.
